title: I'm disconnected from a game every 2 minutes
body:
Hi, imma srsly done and annoyed with this problem. This issue started month ago. I connect to the game. Everything is okey and suddenly in tf or just random moment and imma disconnected. I can see everyone move but i cant. Then i see me die. And after 30sec imma back. I tried IP Helper, P2P, reinstall lol. My ping is 17 ms. 
I wrote to support so i would see what they will say. But. God dam. I wanna play :D season ends and.. -.-
Someone any tips? :)

replies.body: You may be having a poor connection or network problem that's failing to maintain communication with the game.  Input delays and being unable to see things happening while in-game further affirms that something is hindering your connection.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis of what exactly is going on.  The results will also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know what you find!
